name: DESIGHT
description:
Gameplay

DESIGHT is a first-person shooter without shooting. It is a short game inspired by Superhot. 
Find the exit before the building collapses!

(This game was made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 in less than 48 hours)

THEME

"The theme is: GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC."
DESIGHT is a first-person shooter without shooting!

Controls

Move - WASD
Throw/Aim/Recall Revolver - Left click
Lower aim: Right click
